name: Posterior Cingulate Cortex (PCC)
description: Central hub of the DMN, involved in self-referential thinking.

name: Medial Prefrontal Cortex (mPFC)
description: Key DMN node for social cognition and self-referential processing.

name: Left Inferior Parietal Lobule (L-IPL)
description: DMN component involved in memory retrieval and attention.

name: Right Inferior Parietal Lobule (R-IPL)
description: DMN component involved in spatial attention and memory.

name: Left Medial Temporal Lobe (L-MTL)
description: DMN region connecting to memory systems in hippocampus.

name: Right Medial Temporal Lobe (R-MTL)
description: DMN region connecting to memory systems in hippocampus.

name: Precuneus
description: DMN region involved in visuospatial imagery and consciousness.

name: Ventromedial Prefrontal Cortex (vmPFC)
description: DMN region for emotional processing and decision-making.

name: Left Angular Gyrus (L-AG)
description: DMN node involved in semantic processing and memory.

name: Right Angular Gyrus (R-AG)
description: DMN node involved in semantic processing and memory.
